title: Emergency! It Happened Again! Can't Play!
body:
Been playing this game for almost 5 years on low-spec running smoothly at 60fps and about 50 - 55 ping (with a few occasional drops and spikes respectively).

Now for the second time, I try to start my game and I get a screen (after champion selection) saying something about not having optimal screen resolution!

I remember awhile back somebody told me a fix about matching the data in a folder to my screen resolution, but I don't remember the exact instructions and don't want to corrupt any files.

PLEASE HELP! 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
It sounds like you're seeing the *out of range* black screen issue in the loading screen. This is an issue we're aware of and deployed a fix that solved this for some players, but we're still looking into a permanent solution that works for everyone. For now, you should be able to work around this by exiting Fullscreen mode in the loading screen. You should be able to do this by hitting **ALT+ENTER** in the loading screen to enter a windowed mode.

Let me know if this worked for you.
Didn't work, but I changed windowed mode from 0 to 1 in the file and it worked.
